languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, мы наблюдаем эскадру {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Имперского флота{/g}, ведущую наступление на пиратскую стаю. Силы обеих флотилий сравнимы. Вы желаете вмешаться?"
"Lord Captain, we have an {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, мы наблюдаем эскадру {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Имперского флота{/g}, ведущую наступление на пиратскую стаю. Силы обеих флотилий сравнимы. Вы желаете вмешаться?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, we have an Imperial Fleet squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"
"Lord Captain, we have an Imperial Fleet squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"

"Lord Captain, we have an {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"
"Lord Captain, we have an {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"

languages.text: "Lord Captain, ein Geschwader der {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}imperialen Kriegsflotte{/g} bereitet einen Angriff auf eine Bande von Piraten vor. Beide Flottillen sind ähnlich stark. Sollen wir eingreifen?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, ein Geschwader der imperialen Kriegsflotte bereitet einen Angriff auf eine Bande von Piraten vor. Beide Flottillen sind ähnlich stark. Sollen wir eingreifen?"
"Lord Captain, ein Geschwader der imperialen Kriegsflotte bereitet einen Angriff auf eine Bande von Piraten vor. Beide Flottillen sind ähnlich stark. Sollen wir eingreifen?"

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, un escadron de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Marine impériale{/g} s'apprête à attaquer un groupe de pirates. Les forces des deux flottilles sont comparables. Souhaitez-vous intervenir ? »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, un escadron de la Marine impériale s'apprête à attaquer un groupe de pirates. Les forces des deux flottilles sont comparables. Souhaitez-vous intervenir ? »

« {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, un escadron de la Marine impériale s'apprête à attaquer un groupe de pirates. Les forces des deux flottilles sont comparables. Souhaitez-vous intervenir ? »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, hay un escuadrón de la {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Armada Imperial{/g} que se dispone a enfrentarse a un grupo de piratas. Ambas flotillas tienen una potencia comparable. ¿Desea intervenir?».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, hay un escuadrón de la Armada Imperial que se dispone a enfrentarse a un grupo de piratas. Ambas flotillas tienen una potencia comparable. ¿Desea intervenir?».

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン、{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}帝国海軍{/g}の艦隊が海賊と交戦中です。両艦隊の戦力は伯仲しています。介入しますか？」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン、帝国海軍の艦隊が海賊と交戦中です。両艦隊の戦力は伯仲しています。介入しますか？」

languages.text: “舰长大人，我们发现一支{g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}帝国海军{/g}中队正打算与一支海盗舰队交战，双方实力不相上下。您打算插手此事吗？”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，我们发现一支帝国海军中队正打算与一支海盗舰队交战，双方实力不相上下。您打算插手此事吗？”
“舰长大人，我们发现一支帝国海军中队正打算与一支海盗舰队交战，双方实力不相上下。您打算插手此事吗？”

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan, bir korsan çetesiyle çatışmaya girmek için hazırda bekleyen bir {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}İmparatorluk Donanması{/g} eskadramız mevcut. Her iki filotillanın da gücü yakın. Müdahale etmek istiyor musunuz?"
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, we have an {g|Encyclopedia:ImperialNavyGlossary}Imperial Navy{/g} squadron preparing to engage a pirate mob. The forces of both flotillas are comparable. Do you wish to intervene?"
